name: MusicalNotesDrill
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: musical notes drill
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill helps you memorize the tones for the twelve musical notes. The skill does this via drills and quizzes. During a drill, you just listen to the to the name and tone of the note. During a quiz, it gives you the tone of the note and you respond with the name of the note. At any time, you can say, “Quiz” or “Drill.”

For other drill skills, please go to: http://www.voicedrills.com

This skill was designed and developed by Witlingo. If you have feedback, please send an email to contact@witlingo.com
